pageContext.claim: “Yet, in less than 10 percent of the active pharmaceutical ingredients needed to make these drugs -- they're currently manufactured in America -- more than 50 percent, however, are made in India and China.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump exaggerates here. Janet Woodcock, director of the US Food and Drug Administration’s Center for Drug Evaluation and Research told the House of Representatives that facilities in China supplied roughly 13 percent of the active pharmaceutical ingredients serving the U.S. market.
